price: U njemu će vječno ostati i patnja im olakšana biti neće, niti će im se vremena dati.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunẓarūna
